PocketChangeSettings.ProbabilityNote: NOTE: The total values of the probabilities should not exceed 100% otherwise it will fail to correctly calculate.

MinCoinAmount.Name: Minimum Coin Amount
MinCoinAmount.Hint: Minimum number of coins a token can receive in cp if not 0. [default: 10]

IgnoreExistingCoin.Name: Ignore Existing Coin
IgnoreExistingCoin.Hint: Tokens that already have coin are ignored. [default: true]

AllowedCreatureTypes.Name: Allowed Creature Types
AllowedCreatureTypes.Hint: List of creature types that can receive coin, types are separated by commas. (e.g., humanoid, beast, monstrosity) [default: humanoid]

NoCoinChance.Name: Penniless Chance
NoCoinChance.Hint: Probability of a token receiving no coin. (0-100%) [default: 0%]

TenPercentGoldChance.Name: Squalid Chance
TenPercentGoldChance.Hint: Probability of a token receiving one tenth the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 5%]

HalfGoldChance.Name: Poor Chance
HalfGoldChance.Hint: Probability of a token receiving half the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 10%]

DoubleCoinChance.Name: Affluent Chance
DoubleCoinChance.Hint: Probability of a token receiving double the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 10%]

TripleCoinChance.Name: Rich Chance
TripleCoinChance.Hint: Probability of a token receiving triple the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 5%]

HidePocketChangeChatMsg.Name: Hide Chat Messages
HidePocketChangeChatMsg.Hint: Hide chat messages when coin is generated. [default: false]

HideRandomLootChatMsg.Name: Hide Chat Messages
HideRandomLootChatMsg.Hint: Hide chat messages when items are granted. [default: false]
